name: Exile-Run-Round
description:
Exile-Run-Round is a fantasy endless runner that lets players play the role of an exile running around a small island. The game also features: original 2D cel-shading art, player melee attack, random spawning system, and dynamic change of game difficulty.    

Exile-Run-Round aims to give players the feel of immediate danger as well as challenges and rewards associated with it via dynamic gameplay systems.  

Game controls:

  • Movement left-right: A-D
  • Attack: Left mouse button 
  • Pause: Spacebar

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam #189 from February 19, 2021 to February 25, 2021. The theme for the jam was Small Island. The game was created by 1 person and it takes about 50-60 hours.
